item.title: Features
item.description: Features Keyword extraction: Moodle Course: By reading keywords from course names, course descriptions and keywords added by the educators we remove common words, which are stored in a blacklist, such as “a,” “an,” etc. (Functionality and blacklist sourced from beliefmedia.com). SmartLibrary constructs SQL queries from the extracted keywords to read material names and links associated with the keywords from the database. Crawler: We built a crawler which can extract learning material names and keywords from the HTML code of websites such as Coursera.

item.title: Process
item.description: Process We dedicated initial time to conceptualising the idea for the plugin, exploring its potential impact and benefits. This involved learning from Moodle Academy about building Moodle plugins and creating first drafts to outline key functionalities. With a clearer vision, we strategically divided the overall idea into smaller, manageable tasks. Each task was designed to contribute to the overarching goal of the plugin. Adopting agile methodologies, we embraced a collaborative and iterative approach.
